alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 11:05AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Coffee, Geneva, Houston, western Jackson, Walton, Holmes and Washington Counties through NOON CDT... At 1105 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Hartford to 8 miles north of De Funiak Springs to 9 miles southeast of Crestview. Movement was east at 30 to 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Vernon, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Geneva, Marianna, Chipley, Graceville, Dothan, Hartford, Taylor, Ashford, Slocomb, Samson, Cowarts, Webb, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Union and Liberty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
